book.modonomicon.demo.conditional.name: Conditional Category
book.modonomicon.demo.features.command.d: This entry runs a command when you first read it.
book.modonomicon.demo.features.command.i: This entry just ran a command when you first read it. Look into your chat!
book.modonomicon.demo.features.component: An entry showcasing item stack icons with data components
This entry has an icon that is an ItemStack with a data component.
book.modonomicon.demo.features.condition: Conditional pages unlock if a player has satisfied their condition.
Depends on an advancement being unlocked.
Advancement Conditions unlock, as the name implies, if a player has an advancement.
Depends on Condition Root being read.
This entry depends on Condition Root being read.
Depends on Condition Level 1 Entry being unlocked.
The parent entry for conditional entries.
Root page for our condition / unlock tests.
book.modonomicon.demo.features.custom_ic: This entry has a custom texture with size 32x32 as icon!
This entry has a custom texture with size 32x32 as icon!
book.modonomicon.demo.features.empty.int: Empty pages allow to add .. empty pages.
book.modonomicon.demo.features.entity.en: This entry showcases a spotlight page with an entity.
A sample entity page with automatic title.
book.modonomicon.demo.features.image.ima: A  sample text for the sample image.
book.modonomicon.demo.features.image.int: Image pages allow to show images.
book.modonomicon.demo.features.image.tes: A very long sample image text to test page scaling here. It is ridiculously long and I hope no one ever actually uses it like that because, please, people need to read this! What is this, a text for ants? Let's add some more text just to show that we can, because yes, we are just that good at creating text.
book.modonomicon.demo.features.multibloc: Multiblock pages allow to preview multiblocks both in the book and in the world.
book.modonomicon.demo.features.name: Features Category
book.modonomicon.demo.features.recipe.in: Recipe pages allow to show recipes in the book.
book.modonomicon.demo.features.recipe.sm: A smoking recipe page with one recipe and some text.
book.modonomicon.demo.features.spotlight: Spotlight pages allow to show items (actually, ingredients).

A sample spotlight page with custom title.\
It shows how an [](item://minecraft:apple) can be rendered with a little border and fancyness around it.\
I am adding this link to see if spotlight pages have an offset problem. \
The entry needs to be longer to trigger scaling.\
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed sed odio eu dolor ornare tempor. In nibh erat, finibus sed eros id, finibus interdum justo. Aenean luctus, magna at pharetra accumsan, tellus libero tincidunt enim, id varius ante sem sit amet ipsum.
A sample spotlight page with automatic title.
A sample spotlight page with an item with components
A sample spotlight page with a potion
book.modonomicon.demo.formatting.advance: This text comes from a macro (Random.nextDouble()): [{}](my.test.macro)

Unordered List:
- List item
- List item 2
- List item 3

\
And now some other text.

<t>this.could.be.a.translation.key<t>     
***This is bold italics***     
*++This is italics underlined++*
[](item://minecraft:diamond)
[TestText](item://minecraft:emerald)

Unordered List:
- List item
- List item 2
- List item 3

Ordered List:
1. Entry 1
2. Entry 2
This page is to test title scaling!
Ridiculously superlong title that should be scaled!

This page features a very long text that will be scaled down to fit the page size.
[It has a Link](entry://features/multiblock) to check if click detection works on scaled texts. It has [another Link](entry://formatting/basic) for the same reason.
Finally it has a [third link](entry://formatting/always_locked) because why not. From now on we just add some text with no particular function except to make the page longer.
Not extremely useful for the reader, but necessary for the poor Kli-Kli testing this.
book.modonomicon.demo.formatting.always_: Used to demonstrate linking to locked entries

book.modonomicon.demo.name: Demo Book
book.modonomicon.demo.tooltip: A book to showcase & test Modonomicon features.
book.modonomicon.demo_leaflet.leaflet.le:
This is a demo leaflet. It has some features:
1. It's a leaflet. Yay.
2. All page types modonomicon supports.
3. No categories, no books, no mess.
4. Fun! (If you like leaflets)
Despite being a leaflet, it can have as many pages as you like!
Now just imagine a few more pages.
book.modonomicon.demo_leaflet.name: Demo Leaflet
book.modonomicon.demo_leaflet.tooltip: A simple leaflet to show how modonomicon handles those.

To navigate to a bookmark, click on it in this list.
\
\
To add a bookmark, open an entry and click the "Add Bookmark" button on the bottom right.
\
\
To remove a bookmark, navigate to it and click the "Remove Bookmark" button on the bottom right.
